newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ka Wah Bank raises FRCD to US$130 mln.
newsitem.headline: Ka Wah Bank raises FRCD to US$130 mln.

text.p: Ka Wah Bank's floating rate certificate of deposit issue was raised to US$130 million from US$50 million, arranger Bayerische Landesbank Hong Kong said.
The issue was 2.3 times oversubscribed, bringing the total commitments to over US$160 million. However, the final allotment was scaled back by approximately 30 percent, the arranger said.
The facility has a final maturity of five years with a put and a call option in year three. The issue was priced at par to float at 40 basis points over the three-month London Interbank Offered Rate.
With fees, the all-in return for top-tier managers is 58 basis points.
Arrangers are Bayerische Landesbank Hong Kong, HSBC, Bank Austria Aktiengesellschaft Hong Kong and NordLB Singapore.
Lead managers are Daiwa Securities Hong Kong, ANZ Asia, BNP Hong Kong, DKB Asia, Dresdner Bank Hong Kong, Landesbank Hessen-Thuringen Girozentrale and Standard Chartered Bank.

Co-lead managers are Asahi Finance Hong Kong, Banco Exterior de Espana Hong Kong, Bear Stearns Asia, CARIPLO-Cassa di Risparmio delle Provincie Lombarde SpA-Hong Kong, Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce Hong Kong, DG Bank, Industrial Bank of Korea Hong Kong, Landesbank Schleswig-Holstein and Merita Bank Singapore.

Managers are Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena S.p.A Singapore, Bayerische Vereinsbank Hong Kong, BW Bank, China Construction Bank Hong Kong, Credito Italiano Hong Kong, Dah Sing Bank, Den Danske Bank, Landesbank Saar, Landesgirokasse oeffentliche Bank und Landessparkasse and Schroders Asia. --Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2847 4039
